title: innumum sandhEhappaDalAmO
sahitya:
innamumasandEhappaDalAmO IshA

anupallavi

ponnambalam tanil tANDavamADiya pon kazhalai ninaivil vaikka terindu nAn

caraNam

anna mayamenum kOsham tanilE andaNar mudal pulaiyar varaikkum
pinnamaravE
tONudE anri bhEdamonrum kANEn tannai ariginra tavmE peridenru dharaNiyil
gOpAlakrSNan
shonnadellAm marandu mAya shuzhalilE vizhundu uzhanru kavizhnda niyAi shiva
shiva nI

 (alternate line)

sonnadellAm marandu inda mAya shuzhalilE vIzhndadalainadAi shiva shiva nI
